about_the_game:
The long anticipated sequel to the award winning Shop Heroes title is here!

Freshly graduated from of the prestigious shopkeeping academy, you received an invitation from your uncle’s old friend, Jacque. Your uncle has mysteriously vanished, leaving his once-legendary shop in ruins. Now, it’s up to you to restore its former glory and reclaim its status as the most renowned shop across the lands. Do you have the wit, grit, and business savvy to go from zero to hero?

Immerse yourself in an Idle Simulation Tycoon RPG like no other! Expand your empire by running a profitable item shop, crafting legendary equipment for your customers, and commanding mighty heroes on epic quests to gather rare artifacts and blueprints. Challenge elite shopkeepers, rise through the ranks, and prove yourself as the ultimate shopkeeping legend!

~~~~~~~~~
🛍️BECOME A MASTER SHOPKEEPER
~~~~~~~~~
◆ CUSTOMIZE & DESIGN your dream item shop with endless layouts and decorations
◆ CRAFT & FUSE legendary gear to attract VIP customers and grow your reputation
◆ TRADE with other shopkeepers worldwide to expand your fame and fortune
◆ PERSONALIZE your shopkeeper to showcase your unique styles and flair

~~~~~~~~~
⚔️EMBARK ON AN EPIC RPG ADVENTURE
~~~~~~~~~
◆ RECRUIT & EQUIP mighty heroes, each with their own unique abilities
◆ COLLECT & LOOT epic loot across time-limited dungeons and themed events
◆ TEAM UP with your friends or make new ones to form a thriving alliance
◆ BATTLE fearsome bosses and slay titans together to prove your strength


What are you waiting for? Join millions of players worldwide in Shop Legends—where every sale, every hero, and every crafted masterpiece brings you closer to glory. Prepare yourself for endless adventure as Aragonia awaits your awakening!
